definition: hydrochloric acid HCl/also written 鹽酸|盐酸
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Moisture will cause hydrochloric acid formation.
sentences.chinese: 水蒸汽將導致氫氯酸的生成。

sentences.english: In the presence of moisture it will form hydrochloric acid.
sentences.chinese: 在有水蒸汽存在的情況下，它會生成氫氯酸。
